statements: SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences;
SELECT user_id, consent_given, consent_timestamp FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences ORDER BY consent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT id, user_id, sensitive_information FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given, consent_timestamp, sensitive_information FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences;
SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences ORDER BY consent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_consents FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT id, user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given, consent_timestamp, sensitive_information FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences WHERE sensitive_information <> '' AND consent_given = true;
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences GROUP BY user_id, ar_experience_id;
SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, ar_experience_id FROM consent_mechanisms WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences WHERE sensitive_info_protected = FALSE;
SELECT name, description FROM ar_experiences WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms JOIN ar_experiences ON consent_mechanisms.ar_experience_id = ar_experiences.id;
SELECT * FROM consent_mechanisms WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT id, user_id FROM consent_mechanisms WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given FROM consent_mechanisms WHERE ar_experience_id IN (SELECT id FROM ar_experiences WHERE sensitive_info_protected = true);
SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.ar_experience_id, a.name FROM consent_mechanisms c JOIN ar_experiences a ON c.ar_experience_id = a.id;
SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.ar_experience_id, a.name FROM consent_mechanisms c JOIN ar_experiences a ON c.ar_experience_id = a.id WHERE c.consent_given = true ORDER BY c.id DESC;
SELECT * FROM consent_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM consent_users WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY experience_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, experience_id, date_time FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_given = false ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT username, email, consent_given FROM consent_users INNER JOIN consent_logs ON consent_users.user_id = consent_logs.user_id WHERE consent_logs.experience_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consent_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM consent_users WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT u.username, e.experience_name, cl.date_time FROM consent_users u JOIN consent_logs cl ON u.user_id = cl.user_id JOIN ar_experiences e ON cl.experience_id = e.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY experience_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(experience_id) AS num_experiences FROM consent_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_experiences > 1;
SELECT * FROM consent_requests;
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_given FROM consent_requests WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT ar_name, description FROM ar_experiences WHERE sensitive_info = FALSE ORDER BY ar_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_id, consent_status FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_status = TRUE AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM consent_requests;
SELECT id, user_id, consent_given FROM consent_requests ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ar_name, description FROM ar_experiences WHERE sensitive_info = TRUE AND ar_name != 'Example';
SELECT * FROM AR_User_Information;
SELECT username, email FROM AR_User_Information WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM AR_User_Information WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AR_User_Information ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AR_User_Information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM AR_User_Information WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM AR_User_Information WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT * FROM AR_User_Information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM AR_User_Information WHERE consent_given = true ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, username FROM AR_User_Information WHERE consent_given = true ORDER BY email ASC;
